ExpenseTracker

Class NoSavingNoBalance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ExpenseTracker.NoSavingNoBalance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State

    public class NoSavingNoBalance
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
    A Wallet state in which both the balance property and the savings property are 0
    Author:
    Daniele Palazzo
